schema_injection_methods: Root layout: StructuredData component (Organization + WebSite on every page)
Per-page: inline generateStructuredData() functions with JSON-LD script tags
lib/seo/schema-generator.ts: Advanced generator (used by enhanced-schema API, not by most pages)
summary.multi_site_readiness: PARTIAL -- blog/[slug] uses dynamic siteName/siteDomain. StructuredData component and news/[slug] hardcode 'Yalla London'.

issues: No SearchAction (correct -- no site search exists)

root_layout.note: These schemas are injected on EVERY page via the root layout head.

schemas.note: Uses dynamic siteName, siteDomain, siteSlug from site config. Logo path derived from siteSlug. Best multi-site implementation in codebase.
issues: Author type is Organization, not Person -- weaker E-E-A-T signal
inLanguage hardcoded to 'en-GB' even for Arabic content

fields: itemListElement (ListItem for each post with name, url, image, datePublished, author)

issues: isPartOf name hardcoded to 'Yalla London Blog' (L172)
baseUrl uses getDefaultSiteId() which resolves to yalla-london

schemas.note: Includes nested ItemList with news items. Correct listing pattern.

homepage.recommendation: Add WebPage schema with description of site purpose

shop_pages.recommendation: Add Product schema with offers, pricing, availability

london_by_foot.recommendation: Add TouristTrip or Route schema with Place sub-items

deprecated_schemas_found.reason: Restricted to authoritative government and health websites only since August 2023
deprecated_schemas_found.action_required: Remove getFAQStructuredData() and 'faq' case from component. Remove FAQPageSchema from schema-generator.ts. Replace callers with Article schema.

generators.getEnhancedEventStructuredData: Extended Event with geo, offers, performers, organizer
generators.getArticleStructuredData: Basic Article (LEGACY -- hardcodes 'Yalla London', uses Pinterest logo URL)
generators.getEnhancedArticleStructuredData: Extended Article with wordCount, articleBody, topics
generators.getPlaceStructuredData: TouristAttraction with geo, hours, amenities, rating

schema_generator_library.status: Available but underutilized by public pages
schema_generator_library.usage: Primarily used by /api/seo/enhanced-schema API route and pre-publication gate. Most public pages use inline generateStructuredData() instead.
schema_generator_library.recommendation: Migrate inline generators to use centralized schema-generator.ts for consistency

findings.description: FAQPage schema still generated in structured-data.tsx despite Google deprecation since August 2023. Will trigger validation warnings in GSC.
findings.recommendation: Remove getFAQStructuredData() and 'faq' case. Replace with Article schema where FAQ content exists.

findings.description: StructuredData component has 6+ hardcoded 'Yalla London' references plus London-specific addresses. All non-London sites emit incorrect schema.
findings.recommendation: Replace hardcoded values with site config. Use getSiteConfig(siteId) pattern from blog/[slug] as reference.

findings.description: Legacy getArticleStructuredData() (L81-102) uses Pinterest-hosted image as publisher logo and hardcodes 'Yalla London'. Should be removed.
findings.recommendation: Remove legacy function. All callers should use getEnhancedArticleStructuredData().

findings.description: News detail page hardcodes 'Yalla London' as publisher name (L346) and logo path (L350).
findings.recommendation: Use dynamic site config from headers.

findings.description: No schema on 7+ public page types: homepage, about, contact, events listing, experiences, hotels, shop, london-by-foot. Only Organization + WebSite from root layout.
findings.recommendation: Add appropriate schema: WebPage (homepage), AboutPage (about), ContactPage (contact), ItemList+Event (events), Product (shop), TouristTrip (london-by-foot).

findings.description: Article author type is Organization instead of Person. Google E-E-A-T guidelines favor Person author with credentials.
findings.recommendation: Add Person author schema with name, url, and credentials. Keep Organization as publisher.

findings.description: Blog category page CollectionPage hardcodes 'Yalla London' in publisher (L176), name (L169), and isPartOf (L172).
Article inLanguage hardcoded to 'en-GB' regardless of Arabic content view.
findings.recommendation: Read locale from headers and set inLanguage accordingly.

findings.description: No @id for entity linking. Organization and WebSite schemas lack @id URIs, preventing knowledge graph consolidation.
findings.recommendation: Add @id: '{baseUrl}/#organization' and @id: '{baseUrl}/#website'. Reference in Article publisher/author fields.

findings.description: Review and Place/TouristAttraction generators exist in StructuredData component but are never used on any page.
findings.recommendation: Wire Review schema to review-type articles. Wire Place to london-by-foot and experiences pages.

findings.description: Duplicate schema generation logic across structured-data.tsx component, per-page inline generators, and schema-generator.ts library. Maintenance burden and inconsistency risk.
findings.recommendation: Consolidate to schema-generator.ts as canonical source, invoked from page-level code.
